title: High-end Player of Mystery - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manhua   Black Belly   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Mysterious Past   Mystery Solving   Past Plays a Big Role   Strong Love Interests   Survival Game   Transported into a Game World
author: 忘川小妖
description:
Through an accident, Yu Yu became involved in a strange game world. If he wanted to survive, he had to complete the tasks assigned by the game. However, the game tasks were strange and constantly changing, making it difficult to distinguish between what is true and false. From time to time, some absurd plotlines occur, catching Yu Yu by surprise. Fortunately, the handsome-looking brother Yun Ze protected him all the way.

Yu Yu in the game: 'Zeze, I'm scared, I want to sleep with you.'

Yun Ze: '...Scram'

Yu Yu outside the game: 'Zeze, I'm scared-'

Yun Ze: 'Here, come and sleep together.'

Yu Yu: '...'

A long term idiotic and occasionally black-bellied bottom & a handsome and smart top, with moderate sweetness and angst, welcome all the interruptions.>
